title.native: やくならマグカップも 二番窯
title.romaji: Yakunara Mug Cup Mo: Niban Gama

description: The second season of Yakunara Mug Cup Mo.
synonyms: วัยฝันปั้นแก้วมัค ภาค 2

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

title.native: やくならマグカップも
やくならマグカップも
ロクローの大ぼうけん

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/荒川稔久)

Married to fellow scriptwriter [Hiroko Naka](https://anilist.co/staff/181820/).

Jun Kamiya is an anime director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/junkamiya)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/荒川稔久)

Married to fellow scriptwriter [Hiroko Naka](https://anilist.co/staff/181820/).

[Official Website](https://aya-uchida.net) | [Website](https://columbia.jp/uchidaaya/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ichigoshiroppu/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aya_uchida) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aya_Uchida) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%86%85%E7%94%B0%E5%BD%A9)

She is a Japanese voice actress and singer affiliated with JTB Entertainment. She also a member of famous media franchise "Love Live!".

__Non-anime roles:__
- Quency - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%9F%E8%A1%8C&cell029=%E5%A5%B3%E6%80%A7&keyword=&cell028=&cell004=&name=%E7%94%B0%E4%B8%AD%E3%80%80%E7%BE%8E%E6%B5%B7&id=242&label=1) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minazou_373) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/minazou_in_sta/)

Announced her marriage on November 22, 2023.

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Alice](https://anilist.co/character/292758/Tendou-Alice) - Blue Archive (Video Game)
- Linaria - Granblue Fantasy (Video Game)
- Urakaze, Wakaba - Azur Lane (Video Game)
- Rover (Female) - Wuthering Waves (Video Game)

[Website](https://yu-serizawa.com/) | [Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=229) | [Profile (i☆Ris)](https://iris.dive2ent.com/profile/member.php?id=1000226) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/@iRis_s_yu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/seriko_is_no.1/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yu_Serizawa) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芹澤優)

Yuu Serizawa is a voice actress and member of the anisong and idol unit [i☆Ris](https://anilist.co/staff/131442), signed to DIVE II Entertainment, a sub-label of Avex Entertainment. She is associated with the color blue in the unit.

**Non-anime roles:**
• Nina - Memento Mori (VG)
• Bay - NIKKE: Goddess of Victory (VG)
• Nicole - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
• Gentildonna - Uma Musume: Pretty Derby (VG)
• Asakura Karen - Heaven Burns Red (VG)

__Height:__ 145 cm
__Nicknames:__ ゆうき (Yuuki), わかちー (Wakachi)
__Hobbies:__ Piano
__Favorite anime song:__ Kitadanihiroshi's "We Are!"

[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=339) | [Profile (i☆Ris)](https://iris.dive2ent.com/profile/member.php?id=1000222) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iris_w_yuki) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuki_wakai/) | [Wiki (en)]() | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/若井友希)

Part of J-pop idol group [i☆Ris](https://anilist.co/staff/131442).

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=294) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/abbieizumi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/_rina_honnizumi___/)

She debuted in 2013 and graduated from the Tokyo Animation College in March the same year.
A Japanese television producer and ceramic artist.
